mainText.attr1: Controls modelled after Tactical Mode controls.
Add items via double click on them.
Maps can be saved and loaded.
Last map used gets automatically saved (when player hits Play button).
On the right side of the screen you'll see object categories.
Double click on an object to add it.
Click on the 3D object - to modify it.
Left click and hold to move.
There's a bunch of options available in the Environment and Other tabs. Some are direct mirrors of the same options available in Arena and Skirmish modes.
Using the battle editor can be a bit involved. So I'm going to keep this topic short - if you experiment I'm sure you'll be ok.
